Package org.joml

Class LineSegmentd

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joml.LineSegmentd
  • public class LineSegmentd
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an undirected line segment between two points.
    Author:
    Kai Burjack

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      double aX

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LineSegmentd()
      Create a new LineSegmentd of zero length on the point (0, 0, 0).
      LineSegmentd​(double aX, double aY, double aZ, double bX, double bY, double bZ)
      Create a new LineSegmentd between the two points.
      LineSegmentd​(LineSegmentd source)
      Create a new LineSegmentd as a copy of the given source.
      LineSegmentd​(Vector3dc a, Vector3dc b)
      Create a new LineSegmentd between the given two points.

        public LineSegmentd​(double aX,
                    double aY,
                    double aZ,
                    double bX,
                    double bY,
                    double bZ)
        Create a new LineSegmentd between the two points.
        Parameters:
        aX - the x coordinate of the first point
        aY - the y coordinate of the first point
        aZ - the z coordinate of the first point
        bX - the x coordinate of the second point
        bY - the y coordinate of the second point
        bZ - the z coordinate of the second point

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return a string representation of this line segment.

        This method creates a new DecimalFormat on every invocation with the format string "0.000E0;-".
